inclusion.criterion: Children between the ages of 18 months and 36 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: with defects 25 cm squared or less
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Allergic reaction to any of the components of the bone substitute Allogenic Plus
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone, but is likely eligible for this trial.
